full_summary:
# [Request for Proposal: Demolish Staff House Building / Resolute Bay House Demolition]
```markdown
### Project Title
Demolish Staff House Building / Resolute Bay House Demolition

### Solicitation Number
EW038-230491/A

### contracting Entity
Public Works and Government Services Canada
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

### Publication Date
August 12, 2022

### Tendering Opening Date
August 30, 2022, 16:00:00 [Eastern Time]

### Notice-Contracting Officer Email
matthew.virakorn@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca

### Project Overview
Services publics et Approvisionnement Canada (SPAC) requires a demolition contractor for the Staff House Building / Resolute Bay House Demolition project in Resolute Bay, Nunavut.
The scope of work involves the demolition and disposal of an abandoned residential staff house. The project includes the removal of debris and materials outside the building and situated on the lot.

### Value of the Project
The estimated value of the project is between $100,001 and $250,000.

### Documentation
Drawings and specifications are available for viewing and downloading in a Portable Document Format (PDF). Attachments 1, 2, and 3 contain the Drawings and Specifications Package, RFP, and Tender Set, respectively.

### Solicitation Method
All interested suppliers may submit a bid through Buyandsell.gc.ca.

### Important Dates
- Tendering Opening Date: August 30, 2022, 16:00:00 [Eastern Time]
- Project Completion Date: TBA

### Contact Information
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact:
 Matthew Virakorn, Procurement Officer
 Public Works and Government Services Canada
 (780) 278-6153 (telephone)
 (418) 566-6167 (fax)
```
